sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./framework.css"; import "./master.css"; import photo from "./profile-user.png"; import change from "./cigarette.png"; import setting from "./settings.png"; import multipe from "./multiple-users-silhouette.png"; import friend from "./friends.png"; import { db } from "../fireba/firebase"; // Firebase configuration import { doc, getDoc, getDocs, collection, updateDoc, setDoc } from "firebase/firestore"; import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext"; import { database, ref, push, set } from "../fireba/firebase"; export default function Friend() { const { currentUser } = useAuth(); // Get current user info const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); // Store list of users const [friends, setFriends] = useState([]); // Current user's friends const [isFormVisible, setIsFormVisible] = useState(false); const [newFriend, setNewFriend] = useState({ friend: "" }); const [error, setError] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [loader, setLoader] = useState(false); const [alert, setAlert] = useState(false); const loadFriendData = async () => { try { const friendRef = doc(db, "friends", currentUser.uid); const friendSnap = await getDoc(friendRef); if (friendSnap.exists()) { setFriends(friendSnap.data().friends || []); } } catch (err) { setError("Failed to load data."); } }; // Fetch all users except the current user const fetchUsers = async () => { try { const usersSnapshot = await getDocs(collection(db, "users")); const userList = usersSnapshot.docs.map((doc) => ({ id: doc.id, ...doc.data(), })); setUsers(userList); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching users:", error); } }; // Fetch current user's friends const fetchFriends = async () => { try { const userRef = doc(db, "fr", currentUser.uid); const userSnap = await getDoc(userRef); if (userSnap.exists()) { setFriends(userSnap.data().friends || []); } } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching friends:", error); } }; // Add friend to the current user's Firestore document const addFriend = async (friendId) => { const updatedfriends = [ ...friends, { id: friends.length + 1, friend: newFriend.title, done: false }, ]; try { const friendRef = doc(db, "friends", currentUser.uid); await setDoc(friendRef, { friend: updatedfriends }); setFriends(updatedfriends); setNewFriend({ friend: "" }); } catch (error) { console.error("Error saving task:", error); } }; const openForm = () => setIsFormVisible(true); const closeForm = () => setIsFormVisible(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoader(true); const messageRef = ref(database, 'chat'); const newMessageRef = push(messageRef); set(newMessageRef, { message: message, }) .then(() => { setLoader(false); setAlert(true); // Hide alert after 3 seconds setTimeout(() => { setAlert(false); }, 3000); // Clear form setMessage(""); }) .catch((error) => { alert(error.message); setLoader(false); }); }; return (
{/* Sidebar */}
